response.original_title: McGee and Me!: In the Nick of Time
response.overview: Nick, Phillip, and Renee join their fathers on a mountain climbing trip to California, where Nick must confront his intense fear of heights. When his father falls off a cliff, Nick is forced to find the courage to rescue him, ultimately learning important lessons about bravery and believing in himself
response.title: McGee and Me!: In the Nick of Time
